name: C. Karen and Game
statement:
On the way to school, Karen became fixated on the puzzle game on her
phone! The game is played as follows. In each level, you have a grid
with rows and columns. Each cell originally contains the number .One
move consists of choosing one row or column, and adding to all of the
cells in that row or column.To win the level, after all the moves, the
number in the cell at the -th row and -th column should be equal to
.Karen is stuck on one level, and wants to know a way to beat this level
using the minimum number of moves. Please, help her with this task!
